description.en-us: Hot Wheels USA ( Hot Wheels World/L'Univers in Canada/UK/France, Hot Wheels Meine Kleine Stadt/Il Mondo Hot Wheels in Germany/Italy) was a series of playsets first released in 1980/1981 that lets kids create their own city. Hot Wheels USA was later reissued with new sticker/color updates as part of the Hot Wheels City Sets collection in 2007/2008 and as part of the Matchbox Adventure Links collection in the early 2010s.
